properties.areaDesc: Maalaea Bay; Big Island Southeast Waters; Alenuihaha Channel; Pailolo Channel; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 9:30AM HST until February 19 at 12:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30
kt, with higher gusts, and seas 7 to 12 feet. For the Gale
Watch, east winds 25 to 35 kt, with higher gusts, and seas 8 to
13 feet possible.

* WHERE...Maalaea Bay, Pailolo Channel, Alenuihaha Channel, Big
Island Leeward Waters and Big Island Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until midnight HST
tonight. For the Gale Watch, from late tonight through
Thursday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT HST TONIGHT... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON
